title: STCU Science Research Fields Overview

author: Anton Grigorievich Naumovets, National Academy of Science of Ukraine

segmentation: And our integral target programs they are problems of resource and safety, overexploitation of constructions, installations and engines.
Then nano physics, nano chemistry and nanotechnologies, information and computer technologies.
Problems of mineral resources in Ukraine and their extraction and a special program very acute for Ukraine.
Is Miss Ann in mineral coal?
This probe.
Dreams are financed by special budget and I will give you some hints.
What problems are investigated in the framework of this of this target problems?
For example the problem, the program which is named resource estimation of state and resource of critical objects like pipelines.
Bridges, tunnels and so on and so on.
New methods and means for non distracting control, corrosion prevention, estimation and propagation of atomic power plants.
Resource repair of critical.
Objects.
And reliability and resource of energetic systems pipelines.
I've already mentioned, which is very important for the gas industry for supply of gas in particular to Europe and the creation of normative documents and manuals.
Another integral target problem is connected with nanoscience.
Here I I will mention non electronics sources of life of light microwave devices, infrared detectors, capacitors and other elements nanomaterials.
We will have a special report devoted to this problem which will be given by Doctor Regula, also bionano materials and Nano Med.
Missing.
The next target program is super computer.
We have 9 computer clusters in our Academy.
The largest one is in our Institute of Cybernetics and we have also a grid system which connects us with turn and which Encompases Institute for Theoretical Physics.
Of biological Institute scharko.
Physical technical Institute.
So this system started to work and we are very sad.
Is fight with its functioning there very important program probe program is also programming we working.
They are working in space filled in hydrogeology.
The problems of construction.
The problem which is always with us.
Problem of Cherno Bill, meteorology, education, economics, scientific electronic library information security.
We have good developments in this.
Field and so on.
Also very interesting and actual problem for Ukraine is program connected with mineral resources.
New data on these resources.
New technologies of search and intensity, intensification of oil and gas production, new means of marine environment control and complex processing on of very ferro squirts it dumps.
Who materials I will have?
After tomorrow I will have a special report to you about our activities in materials.
I will only mention very briefly now that these are problems for electrodes of precise for precise automatic electric welding.
This is our traditional activity.
Ukraine is quite prominent in this field.
Titanium alloys, amorphous magnetic materials also.
Allies which are created for nuclear power plants.
This problem is very important to Ukraine and nanopowder.
Us devices and equipment.
I will mention here only main area of our work in this program.
I've already mentioned supercomputers, laser metrology generators which allow you to see under under land.
220 or 30 meters.
Very many interesting applications.
Thermal vision.
Automatic control systems for power systems power cables.
110 kilovolts and of course very acute problem for Ukraine and not only for Ukraine energy saving.
I cannot but mention developments for medicine electrical welding on living tissues.
This original method was developed in our Electrical Welding Institute diagnostic of breathing.
This is application of some technologies developed former earlier for military technologies.
Marine gamma camera for neurosurgery processes and the special milk food for children.
So we see these are examples of our applied science.
Now a few words about cooperation.
We have a rather broad but still not so broad as earlier in Soviet times, cooperation with Russian Academy of Sciences, especially with its Siberian branch.
We are very satisfied with this cooperation now we have 28 current projects.
We are also very grateful to Center for science and Technology of Ukraine.
Mr Andrew Hood told us today about their activities.

Now we have competition organized by Russian Foundation for Basic Research and planned projects for 208 and the following years and also we have a rather broad cooperation with National Center for Scientific Research in France.
So I will finish my part of presentation.
I've used about 11 minutes, so let me thank you for your attention and I pass the word the floor to academician gascue.
Thank you.
